overview: Moving out of your childhood home and into a flat with your mates is one of the watershed moments in life – an exciting opportunity that presents whole new experiences to every young gay man. Which in this particular instance involves getting introduced to a seemingly endless array of fresh cock and copious quantities of spunk! David Hollister leads the fore, with the support of some of the hottest, horniest lads in Czechia – Joel Kris and Erik Climber among them – as these fresh-faced beauties lose every last shred of innocence courtesy of some of the hottest twink action you’re every likely to see. No question about it, this is one flat-sharing tryst that will have your cock throbbing and your balls drained like never before!
title: Gay Flat Mates
